create.error: There was an error processing the players file

signup.failure: There's been an error signing up the player

signoff.failure: There's been an error removing the player

groups.confirm: This will remove the existing groups and their related match results. Do you want to proceed?
groups.failure: An error occurred generating the groups

draw.confirm: This will remove the existing final bracket and their related match results. Do you want to proceed?
draw.failure: An error occurred generating the final bracket draw

missing.draw: Final bracket draw hasn't been generated. Please click on the Generate Draw button
missing.winners: Can't display final bracket as there are group winners missing

update.failure: There's been an error updating the final bracket information

seeds.failure: There's been an error storing the players seed order

results.failure: There's been an error storing the bracket results

save.failure: There's been an error saving group results information: {{error}}

results.failure: There's been an error applying tournament results: {{error}}
